fulltext:
THO NGUYEN 
FPT-Software Solutions Architect 
Email:   
thont.vnn@gmail.com 
Skype :   thont.vn 
Mobile:  
+84586148724 (VN)  
LinkedIn:  
https://www.linkedin.com/in/thont/   
Summary 
Solutions architecture with a passion for transforming business challenges into successful, innovative 
and profitable technology solutions. Skilled communicator and fast-learner with the ability to 
understand, translate, and mediate between both the business- and technology-sides of a given 
initiative.  Extensive experience in the development of enterprise applications including mobile and web 
applications, Big Data / Analytics, SaaS, Multitenant, Microservices, and B2B integrations. 
My top skills and knowledge  
• 
People Management - Building “Effective & Efficient” large scale engineering teams. I have built 
teams of 20+ who can be very effective at producing high quality platform releases. 
• 
Processes – Understanding and creating product life cycle end-to-end processes across cross 
functional teams (e.g. think beyond scrum team) 
• 
Architectures:  SaaS, Multi-tenant, Microservices, Data Warehousing 
• 
Programming Frameworks / Languages – NodeJS, Express, Swift, Cocoa Pod, Java, Flutter, 
C/C++, Python, Tensorflow. 
• 
Backend Technologies – ETL tools, Mongodb,  REST, AWS 
• 
Testing – Production monitoring, load / performance testing.  Think about product life cycle level 
testing strategy. 
My Education 
• 
Graduated from SaiGon University in 2011  
• 
UDACITY : Design of Computer Programs (self-study)  
• 
UDACITY : LSTM Networks (self-study) 
• 
UDACITY : Neural Networks (General) (self-study) 
• 
UDACITY : Responsive Web Design Fundamental (self-study) 
Books I loved:  
- 
The Passionate Developer,  
- 
Pragmatic Thinking and Learning,  
- 
Clean Code, Code complete, Test-Driven Development,  
- 
Productive Projects and Teams,  
- 
The Mythical Man-Month: Essays on Software Engineering 
My working experience  
Companies I did 
FPT SOFTWARE 
Mar 2016 - Current 
Solutions Architect  
A solution architect is responsible for the design of one or more applications or services within an 
organization and is typically part of a solution development team. I must have a balanced mix of 
technical and business skills, and will often work with an enterprise architect for strategic direction. 
§ 
Finding the best tech solution among all possible to solve the existing business problems. 
§ 
 Describing the structure, characteristics, behavior, and other aspects of software to project 
stakeholders. 
§ 
Defining features, phases, and solution requirements. 
§ 
Providing specifications according to which the solution is identified, managed, and delivered 
§ 
Provided executive oversight for all projects under the Program managed to ensure smooth 
project execution, to ensure delivery of quality software products, and to ensure clients are 
satisfied with the work that projects are doing 
§ 
Provided active supports to Project Managers in implementing projects 
HARVEYNASH- NASHTECH  
Aug 2014 – Mar 2016 
Senior Mobile developer / Team leader

includes (but not limited to the following):  
§ 
Handle the entire software development life cycle, end to end

Lead others, or others look to you for guidance. 
§ 
I can self manage your projects supports to Project Managers in implementing projects 
§ 
Managed resources, staffing, skill sets transferring, and recruiting of the Program

Participated in pre-sales meetings and marketing events when necessary 
§ 
Build prototypes at tech scoping stage of projects

measure and optimize memory.

Build and deploy app to apple store

Position: iOS developer 
Domain:  Finance, Business 
Team Size: 8

§ 
FPT Hi-FPT app report information worker group Deployment / Maintenance by date (contract

streams, kill the session. Report indicators deployment and maintenance services ADSL / FTTx

handling of ticket in the shortest time
